name: Youtube - Lights Out - A Dark Youtube Theme
description: A dark and smooth Youtube theme. Fully supports the landing page, watch page, channel page, and search page, among others. Style is currently undergoing a rewrite, so please bear with me while pages are restyled and readded! Last updated: February 10, 2015 Pages currently supported: Landing Page (What to Watch, My Subscriptions, Music) Watch Page Search Page Channel Page Playlist View Page Please leave feedback if you have any thoughts, comments, or issues with the style.
additional_info:
v0.10.2 - February 10, 2015
 - Updated BG image host to imgur
 - Fixed minor YT Center compatibility issue

v0.10.1 - February 4, 2015
 - Minor styling fixes
 - Fixed like/dislike buttons
 - Fixed video title colors

v0.10 - January 17, 2015
 - Complete rewrite of style in progress
 - Currently only landing page, watch page, channel page, and playlist pages are supported, but pages will be readded as I worked through them
 - Most/all outstanding issues with the currently styled pages should be fixed. If you find an issue, please let me know.
 - Optionals will be returning shortly

v0.5.3.1 - August 31, 2014
 - Restyled action bar and description box on watch page

v0.5.3 - August 1, 2014
 - Fixed issues with default mode
 - Themed account selector
 - Minor selector updates
 - Updated description expander theme

v0.5.2.8 - June 2, 2014
 - Fixed white background in inbox
 - Fixed regexp for hover cards
 - Added additional regexp for comments section

v0.5.2.7 - May 13, 2014
 - Fixed white background on titles and descriptions again

v0.5.2.6 - Apr 24, 2014
 - Fixed white background on titles and descriptions

v0.5.2.5 - Apr 8, 2014

v0.5.2.4 - Mar 28, 2014

v0.5.2.3 - Feb 21, 2014

v0.5.2.2 - Feb 21, 2014
 - Minor updates and bugfixes

v0.5.2.1 - Feb 8, 2014
 - Fixed white guide button on hover in new layout

 - Fixed problem with 4:3 aspect ratio videos on HTML5

v0.5.0.7 - Dec 1, 2013

v0.5.0.3

v0.4.1.2 - Oct 15, 2013

v0.4.1.1 - Oct 15, 2013

v0.4.1 - Oct 15, 2013
 - Styled most dropdown menus

 - Styled search page filters dropdown

 - Fixed white border on channel page

v0.4.0.2 - Oct 8, 2013

v0.4.0.1 - Oct 8, 2013

v0.3.2 - Sep 11, 2013

discussions.name: please use white/light grey text for users comments it's unreadable how you set it currently !
